metadata.title: CVE-2023-52687 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  crypto: safexcel - Add error handling for dma_map_sg() calls  Macro dma_map_sg() may return 0 on error. This patch enables checks in case of the macro failure and ensures unmapping of previously mapped buffers with dma_unmap_sg().  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with static analysis tool SVACE.
